page.title: 03CLUBS IN LLANGYNIDR
page.content: THERE ARE ABOUT TWENTY CLUBS IN LLANGYNIDR,THE SUBJECTS COVERED RANGE FROM THE YOUTH CLUB TO THE CONSERVATIONISTS CLUB. MOST ARE WELL ATTENDED, THE AGE RANGE IS FROM 8 YEARS TO ADULT. OUR YOUNG FARMERS ARE A GROUP OF YOUNG PEOPLE WHO ARE INTERESTD IN FARMING. THEY ORGANISE DISCOS AND TRIPS TO RAISE MONEY FOR THEIR FUNDS. ANOTHER INTERSTING CLUB IS THE YOUTH CLUB. THEY GO ON TREASURE HUNTS AROUND THE VILLAGE. THESE ARE ALWAYS A GREAT SUCCESS. THEY ALSO HAVE FILMS AND TRIPS. MOST PEOPLE GO TO CLUBS TO MEET PEOPLE OF THEIR OWN AGE, AND FOR THE ENJOYMENT OF THEM. FINALLY, HERE IS A LIST OF SOME OF THE CLUBS IN LLANGYNIDR:YOUTH CLUB,(YOUTH AND CHILDREN), W.I., GUIDES, GARDENERS CLUB, OVER 60'S, YOUNG FARMERS, WHIST, HISTORY, FOOTBALL AND KEEP FIT. THIS IS REMARKABLE FOR A SMALL VILLAGE.
